column3: produced by infamous  the clock that you've been watching has been stoppin he makes you wait what kind of man does that to a girl he wants if you just give tonight to me i promise my hands will say   they'll say less than a minute take your clothes off we about to start no false alarms even though the traffic downtown don't show no mercy think about the last time i came through i had something more than a gift for you and i don't only fuck you like that on your birthday  baby i just landed bout to get my bags and all i needs an address and i'm on my way  don't fall asleep yes i see you calling me promise it's worth waiting for cuz i'm on my way x
